name: quickstart-semantic-ranking-ts

scripts.get-index-settings: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/getIndexSettings.js
scripts.update-index-settings: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/updateIndexSettings.js
scripts.semantic-query: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/semanticQuery.js
scripts.get-captions: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/semanticQueryReturnCaptions.js
scripts.get-answers: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/semanticAnswer.js

description: Azure AI Search semantic ranking quickstart in TypeScript
